hiveArticle.title: You need a Ice Cream
hiveArticle.body:
You need a Ice Cream, which was written on the box in which I ate the ice cream. I usually do not eat ice cream, but today I was carving for one. One of the reason might be that I have not eaten ice cream from a long time or I wanted some thing cold in the hot weather. Whatever was the reason I went to Ice Cream Works to have an Ice Cream.

The problem with these type of places is that you get so many options and it's hard to choose one of the many. At last I choose mango flavour as it was one of my favorite fruit.

The icecream was awesome and I am sure I could not stop myself to go and have some more options.
